name: One Last Worm Before Bed (VR Jam 2022)
name_original: One Last Worm Before Bed (VR Jam 2022)
description:
One Last Worm Before Bed!

You have one worm to use, try to make it last as long as possible so you can stay up for longer having fun with your brother.

There are items that can help you avoid those pesky fish, but use them sparingly as they can only be used once!

This game was made and submitted for VR Jam 2022 in which the theme was 'One-time use'.

- I've tested the Android build on an Oculus Quest 1. 
- I'm not able to test the PC build but thought I'd upload anyway, so please let me know if there are any issues with it.

Music
"Thief in the Night" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
